text: ileohgehayeo hananim-eun gyeomson haessdeon baegseong-ege chugbog-eul bonaego chug bog-ui dongpyeongwa seopyeon-ui ttang-eul yusan-eu lo jueoss-euni ineun iseula-el jason eul wihayeo wanseongdoen junim-ui yagsog-i mae geudeul-eun innaehayeoss-eum-ila ttohan hananim-eun palaowa geuui baegseong-i se-un geosdeul-eul pagoehayeossnola
